product_name: Mountain House Mexican-Style Rice and Chicken - 2 Servings
long_description: Instant, spicy rice-and-chicken dish, seasoned with tomato, peppers and olives. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents in the pouch provided with boiling water, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Quick and easy meal for camping and backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Instant, spicy rice-and-chicken dish, seasoned with tomato, peppers and olives.
